issue.title: [C++] Add Equals method for FileFragment
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16910](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16910). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`FileFragment` requires `Equals` method. This will be important for features associated with Substrait read node tests[1].

 

 

[1]. https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16855?filter=-1

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16910?focusedCommentId=17564310) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13490
